tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE OEE_Calculation (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  machine_id INT,
  availability DECIMAL,
  performance DECIMAL,
  quality DECIMAL,
  oee DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Production (
  production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  production_date DATE,
  units_produced INT,
  idle_time INT,
  downtime_reason VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE OEE_Records (
   record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   equipment_id INT,
   start_time TIMESTAMP,
   end_time TIMESTAMP,
   downtime_minutes INT,
   production_units INT
);

CREATE TABLE Equipment (
   equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   equipment_name VARCHAR(50),
   manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
   installation_date DATE,
   maintenance_schedule VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Production_Log (
   log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   equipment_id INT,
   production_date DATE,
   production_quantity INT,
   performance_rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE equipment (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR,
    equipment_type VARCHAR,
    setup_time INT,
    production_rate DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE downtime (
    downtime_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    downtime_reason VARCHAR,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE production (
    production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    production_date DATE,
    quantity_produced INT,
    reject_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE efficiency (
    efficiency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    downtime_percentage DECIMAL,
    production_rate DECIMAL,
    efficiency_percentage DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Maintenance (
  maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type TEXT,
  cost FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Downtime (
  downtime_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  downtime_start TIMESTAMP,
  downtime_end TIMESTAMP,
  reason TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Production (
  production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP,
  quantity_produced INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Efficiency (
  efficiency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  production_id INT,
  downtime_id INT,
  maintenance_id INT,
  efficiency FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (production_id) REFERENCES Production(production_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (downtime_id) REFERENCES Downtime(downtime_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (maintenance_id) REFERENCES Maintenance(maintenance_id)
);
